Class DatabaseWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • chipmunk.unlimited.feedback.database.DatabaseWrapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReviewedLectureDatabase, SubscriptionDatabase

    public abstract class DatabaseWrapper
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Superclass for all database interface-classes.
